title.rendered: “IDF and ISA Arrest 20 Suspects in Judea and Samaria: Major Weapons Seizures Included”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF soldiers, the ISA, and the border police arrested 20 wanted individuals throughout Judea and Samaria tonight, eight of which are affiliated with the Hamas terrorist organization.

During the night, the forces arrested 20 wanted individuals throughout Judea and Samaria, eight of which are affiliated with the Hamas terrorist organization.

The soldiers arrested a wanted individual in the village of Zeita in Menashe. In the area, improvised explosives and materials for making charges were found and destroyed. In the Deir Al-Atzoun, which is a part of the brigade’s sector, they found weaponry parts and ammunition.

In the village of Rojeeb in Samaria, the soldiers arrested two wanted individuals, they found and confiscated two handguns, M-16s, ammunition and weaponry parts. In addition, ammunition was found in the city of Hebron and in the village of Daahariya in Judea; they found and confiscated 11 illegal vehicles.

Those who were arrested have been transferred for further security force investigation. There were no injuries to our forces.

So far since the beginning of the war, approximately 2,420 wanted individuals have been arrested throughout the Judea and Samaria Division and the Jordan Valley and Valleys Brigade, approximately 1,210 of them are affiliated with the Hamas terrorist organization.

Attached are pictures of the confiscated warfare instruments: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC21122023.02587
